meanings.sent1: The thrilling book was consuming her thoughts all day.
meanings.sent2: His passion for music consumes him, always consuming new albums.
meanings.sent3: The mystery of the missing sock was consuming her mind.
meanings.sent4: The suspenseful movie was consuming, making her forget about time.
meanings.sent5: The exciting game was consuming, making her lose track of reality.
